Ingredients: Flour, Minced meat/veg, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Cabbage, Masala
Instructions: Mix ingredients for filling, wrap in dough circles, and steam for 10-12 mins. Serve with spicy tomato achar.

Ingredients: Flour, Sugar, Eggs, Butter, Vanilla, Baking Powder
Instructions: Cream butter and sugar, add eggs, fold in dry ingredients. Bake at 180C for 30 mins and frost.

Ingredients: Seasonal fruits, Honey, Mint leaves, Lemon juice
Instructions: Chop all fruits, toss with honey and lemon juice. Garnish with mint for a fresh celebratory feel.

Ingredients: Semolina puris, Boiled potatoes, Chickpeas, Tamarind water, Mint, Chili
Instructions: Fill puris with mashed potato mixture and dunk into the spiced chilled mint water.

Ingredients: Pizza dough, Tomato sauce, Mozzarella, Bell peppers, Mushrooms, Olives
Instructions: Spread sauce on dough, add toppings and cheese. Bake at 220C until crust is golden.

Ingredients: Rice, Milk, Sugar, Cardamom, Ghee, Cashews, Raisins
Instructions: Boil milk and rice on low heat until creamy. Add sugar and nuts. Serve warm for ultimate comfort.

Ingredients: Milk, Cocoa powder, Sugar, Dark chocolate, Marshmallows
Instructions: Whisk cocoa and sugar into warm milk. Stir in chocolate pieces until melted. Top with marshmallows.

Ingredients: Chicken breast, Egg noodles, Carrots, Celery, Onion, Broth
Instructions: Simmer veggies and chicken in broth. Add noodles and cook until soft. Season with salt and pepper.

Ingredients: Lentils, Rice, Turmeric, Cumin, Ghee, Seasonal veg curry
Instructions: Slow cook lentils with spices. Serve with steaming hot rice and a dollop of ghee.

Ingredients: Potatoes, Butter, Milk, Salt, Garlic powder
Instructions: Boil potatoes until soft, mash with butter and milk until smooth and fluffy.

Ingredients: Noodles, Chili oil, Soy sauce, Garlic, Vinegar, Peanuts
Instructions: Toss boiled noodles in a heavy dose of chili oil and garlic to match your fiery mood.

Ingredients: Roasted peanuts, Chopped onion, Tomato, Green chili, Lemon, Mustard oil
Instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl. The sharp lemon and chili provide a refreshing kick.

Ingredients: Chicken wings, Hot sauce, Butter, Garlic, Cayenne pepper
Instructions: Coat wings in flour, fry until crispy, and toss in a buttery hot buffalo sauce.

Ingredients: Puffed rice, Mustard oil, Chanachur, Green chili, Onion, Cucumber
Instructions: Mix puffed rice with raw mustard oil and plenty of green chilies for a sharp, spicy snack.

Ingredients: 70% Cocoa dark chocolate
Instructions: Snap off a piece of high-quality dark chocolate to help lower cortisol levels.

Ingredients: Chamomile tea bag, Hot water, Honey, Digestive biscuits
Instructions: Steep tea for 5 mins, add honey. Sip slowly with crunchy biscuits to calm the nerves.

Ingredients: Noodles, Broth, Ginger, Garlic, Carrot, Spinach, Light spices
Instructions: A gentle, warming soup that feels like a hug in a bowl. Not too spicy, very soothing.

Ingredients: Oats, Milk/Water, Sliced banana, Cinnamon, Walnuts
Instructions: Cook oats until soft. Top with banana and walnuts for a grounded, steady energy release.

Ingredients: Broccoli, Carrots, Beans, Lemon, Light salt
Instructions: Lightly steam vegetables to keep them crunchy and fresh. Season very mildly.

Ingredients: Fresh buffalo milk, Sugar, Culture
Instructions: The 'King of Yogurt' from Bhaktapur is cool, creamy, and incredibly settling for the stomach.

Ingredients: Sushi rice, Nori, Avocado, Cucumber, Mango, Tuna/Salmon
Instructions: A colorful surprise of flavors and textures wrapped in seaweed and rice.

Ingredients: Rice flour crepes, Minced meat, Egg, Onion, Tomato
Instructions: A unique thin-crust rice crepe topped with savory ingredients. A delight for the senses.

Ingredients: Mushroom caps, Cream cheese, Garlic, Breadcrumbs, Herbs
Instructions: Fill mushroom caps with cheese mixture and bake until bubbly and golden.

Ingredients: Ripe mango, Yogurt, Sugar, Cardamom, Ice
Instructions: Blend all ingredients for a vibrant, bright yellow drink that tastes like sunshine.

Ingredients: Samosas, Chickpea curry, Yogurt, Tamarind chutney, Sev
Instructions: Crush samosas and top with hot curry and cold yogurt for a flavor explosion.

Ingredients: Melted chocolate, Strawberries, Marshmallows, Cake cubes
Instructions: Melt chocolate smoothly. Dip fruits and sweets together for a shared experience.

Ingredients: Pasta, Eggs, Pecorino cheese, Guanciale/Bacon, Black pepper
Instructions: Creamy, rich, and made with heart. Emulsify egg and cheese for a perfect sauce.

Ingredients: Rice flour, Ghee, Sugar, Cardamom, Milk tea
Instructions: Prepare sweet ring-shaped bread and serve with a hot, spiced milk tea.

Ingredients: Whole chicken, Rosemary, Garlic, Lemon, Olive oil
Instructions: Roast chicken with aromatics until skin is crispy and meat is tender and juicy.

Ingredients: Cream cheese, Graham cracker crust, Sugar, Fresh strawberries
Instructions: A sweet, indulgent treat that is perfect for sharing with someone special.

Ingredients: Canned tuna, Mayonnaise, Celery, Bread, Salt, Pepper
Instructions: Mix tuna, mayo, and chopped celery. Season well and spread evenly on two slices of bread.

Ingredients: Eggs, Water, Salt
Instructions: Place eggs in cold water, bring to a boil, then cover and let stand for 10 minutes. Cool and peel.

Ingredients: Boiled potatoes, Gram flour, Spices, Oil for frying
Instructions: Mash potatoes with spices, coat in a gram flour batter, and deep fry until golden brown.

Ingredients: Bread, Butter, Sliced cheese
Instructions: Butter the outside of the bread. Place cheese between slices and grill in a pan until cheese is melted.

Ingredients: Cooked rice, Curd/Dahi, Sugar (optional)
Instructions: Mix warm rice with plain curd. Add sugar or salt to taste. A common, simple, daily meal.

Ingredients: Oats, Milk, Chia seeds, Maple syrup
Instructions: Mix all ingredients in a jar, refrigerate overnight. Eat cold in the morning.

Ingredients: Eggs, Milk, Butter, Salt, Pepper, Toast
Instructions: Whisk eggs with milk, cook in butter until fluffy. Serve immediately on buttered toast.

Ingredients: Broccoli, Carrots, Soy sauce, Garlic, Ginger, Rice
Instructions: Quickly saut√© veggies with garlic and ginger. Add soy sauce. Serve over steamed rice.

Ingredients: Plain yogurt, Granola, Berries (optional)
Instructions: Layer yogurt and granola in a bowl. Add a few berries for light flavor.

Ingredients: Black tea, Sugar, Milk, Rusks (hard bread biscuits)
Instructions: Brew strong tea, dip the rusk in it until soft, and enjoy. The classic low-effort snack.
